name: The Red Planet (parisstacy)
description:
MARS, 2099

WAR HAS OVERTAKEN THE RED PLANET

YOU ALONE ARE TASKED WITH DETECTING AND DEFUSING BOMBS WHICH FAILED TO DETONATE UPON OUR ASSAULT

SENSORS TELL US THAT THIS AREA HAS 5 ACTIVE BOMBS

YOUR DRONE HAS COMMANDS TO ASSIST YOU WITH THIS TASK

USE HIM

CONTROLS:

MOUSE - LOOK

WASD - MOVE

PICK UP DRONE - F

CYCLE COMMANDS - Q/E

USE COMMAND - Left Click

INFORMATION:

This is a late submission to the GMTKJAM 2019. It was made in under 48 hours. The theme "Only One" was taken narratively, focusing on isolation and desolation. Please enjoy and feel free to leave feedback. This game was made by:

PARIS STACY (@ppascal_s)

LOGAN OBARR (@LoganOBarr)

ELY STACY (@Somedudeoo7)
